```{r}
#ï½œmessage: false
library(tidyverse)
library(moderndive)
library(ggthemes)
library(patchwork)
theme_set(theme_light)
```

```{r}
data(evals)
glimpse(evals)
```

```{r}
d <- evals |>
  rename(bty = bty_avg,
         sex = gender)
glimpse(d)
```

```{r}
head(d)
```

```{r}
mod1 <- lm(score~ bty,
           data= d)
get_regression_table(mod1)
```

```{r,echo=FALSE}
ggplot(d,
       aes(x = bty,
           y = score)) +
  geom_jitter(alpha = .3) +
  geom_smooth(method = "lm",
              se = FALSE) +
  labs(x = "Beauty",
       y = "Evaluation",
       title = "Simple regression results")
```
